text:
I'm so sick of the U2 Movement / PC Culture. Amoung many other crimes against culture development, their latest is the Ban/Removal of a painting from the 1800s. They claim it promotes pedophilia. Which only shows how uneducated they are. The naked "children" in this painting are NOT children, they are adult nymphs which according to varies mythologies lure men into their death. 

https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2018/feb/06/takedown-waterhouse-naked-nymphs-art-action-manchester-art-gallery-sonia-boyce#img-1

More examples of the PC culture going to far are:

Banning Books (We're doomed to repeat history if we continue to ban the books that teach us about them):  https://nypost.com/2018/02/14/pc-culture-is-tossing-out-classic-american-novels-and-other-comments/amp/

Banned Father Daughter Dance for gender favoritism: http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-5350159/amp/PC-Culture-kills-father-daughter-dance.html
title: Fuck you Political Correctness
